alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued October 14 at 6:29AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Guam, Rota, Saipan and Tinian. * WHEN...Through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Locally heavy showers have been observed on radar and satellite passing just south of Guam. These showers are likely to shift northward along with Tropical Depression 21W to the east. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
